title: 24 hour error purchasing Riot Points
body:
I get the following message:"ERROR: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time. Please wait 24 hours and try again later."
It has been around 41 hours since I last purchased anything and I keep getting the message. I'm afraid it might have bugged out. Can anyone help me with this?

replies.body: The 24 hour limit is a security feature for the store after too many attempts, I'm afraid we have no manual way of removing that.  :(  Your best bet would be to put in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look and find some options in case there is an issue with the method of payment being processed.  Hit us up!

I did write a ticket, one last night and one right now. I am still waiting for a response or anything at all. This has me real worried and I really want to get the skins that are on sale right now before they expire on 2 days.

Don't worry our Billing team has your back, just let them know and they'll do their best to work with you.  Try not to make duplicate tickets, though, that can result in delays and confusion.  Hang tight, we'll get back to you as soon as we can!

Almost 3 days and still not a word from Riot. It has never taken this long to respond to my tickets and the skins I want will soon be removed from being on sale. This is really annoying and frustrating. Can't something be done faster?
Hey, I'm happy to take a look.  What's your ticket number?
The issue was solved after I waited 24 hours without making any attempts and I managed to get the skins I wanted. So everything seems alright for now.

Well I wrote the ticket. However I did it using "I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games" instead of any purchase or RP option since it wanted my credit card info which I felt slightly uncomfortable sharing. As for whether my card has money in it or the information in the shop is answered correctly, yes to both. So I do hope this error gets fixed soon. It hit me at a real bad time.

You should wait a full 24 hours before making another attempt. If you try to make another attempt before that 24 hours is up, it might reset the countdown. *I know this is true for some systems, not entirely sure of this one specifically.* Also, it's possible that they're simply waiting for a payment to clear, if there is any still pending.

If you try to make another attempt before that 24 hours is up, it might reset the countdown. *I know this is true for some systems, not entirely sure of this one specifically.* Also, it's possible that they're simply waiting for a payment to clear, if there is any still pending.

But thats so stupid. That would make no sense considering if I give it a try and it's like 23 hours and 50 minutes past the last try to just reset it entirely. I highly doubt that's the case though I am willing to try. A better decision I thought would be doing a full repair. Not sure if that would help.
A repair wouldn't do anything, as it isn't a client issue. It's an issue with payment. Just be patient.
